pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw:
thanks! changes merged forward to `default` in ign-rendering. I don’t get the crash any more with ogre2 gpu rays. 

I get segfault with ogre1 like you mentioned but it’s happening on exit even without removing a sensor. I think it’s an existing problem and I’ve ticketed an [issue](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/issues/61/crash-on-ogre1-camera-sensor-cleanup) for this
